div.div: Tools setup to build the user guide for the Panecal Scientific Calculator.
Installing the Oxygen XML Authoring Tool
Get started using one of the best XML authoring tools - Oxygen!

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

div.p: Tools setup to build the user guide for the Panecal Scientific Calculator.
To build the user guide for the Panecal Scientific Calculator, you must first set up the environment on your computer as follows:

ul.li: Install the trial version of Oxygen XML authoring tool (version 25.0 above).
Upload the Oxygen XML files in a public GitHub repository.
Publish and share your deliverable using the public GitHub repository.

img.alt: A graphic displaying the system requirements before you set up the environment for building your User Guide.
img.css:oxy-alt-text: A graphic displaying the system requirements before you set up the environment for building your User Guide.

h2.span: Installing the Oxygen XML Authoring Tool

div.p: Get started using one of the best XML authoring tools - Oxygen!
div.section: Ensure that your computer satisifes the basic system requirements to install the Oxygen XML authoring tool.

section.p: Install the Oxygen XML Authoring Tool (version 25.0 or later).

li.span: On a browser instance, type www.oxygenxml.com.

img.alt: Displays a snapshot of what appears on the web page when you choose Products->OxygenXMLAuthor.
img.css:oxy-alt-text: Displays a snapshot of what appears on the web page when you choose Products->OxygenXMLAuthor.

li.span: On the page, select the tab that corresponds to your operating system, and click Download.

span.span: Installation -- Download Oxygen XML Author for 64-bit Windows

img.alt: Displays the web page that enables you to download the OxygenXMLAuthor for the 64-bit operating system.
img.css:oxy-alt-text: Displays the web page that enables you to download the OxygenXMLAuthor for the 64-bit operating system.

li.div: The .exe file downloads to your system.

li.span: Enter the required details in the form provided to obtain your 30-day trial license.

img.alt: Displays the form to enter the required details to obtain the 30-day trial license.
img.css:oxy-alt-text: Displays the form to enter the required details to obtain the 30-day trial license.

li.span: Start the installation wizard to install the Oxygen XML author.
Double-click the Oxygen XML Author shortcut on your desktop to invoke an instance of the tool.
When prompted, enter the 9-line license text in the space provided.
To learn more about the Oxygen XML Author, visit: https://www.oxygenxml.com/doc/versions/25.0/ug-author.
